scenario_details.name: Main Local Models Tab Navigation
scenario_details.description: Can I navigate to Local Models tab and access all model management features?
test_steps: Click Local Models tab from main navigation (Cmd+0)
Can I see the model library browser clearly?
Are model discovery and search options visible?
Can I access model download queue from here?
Can I return to other tabs seamlessly?
acceptance_criteria: Local Models tab is clickable and responsive
Navigation between model views is smooth
Model library browser is visually clear
critical_paths: Main Menu → Local Models → Model Library
recommendations: Test local models tab navigation with real user interactions
Ensure model management interface loads correctly

scenario_details.name: Model Discovery and Installation Workflow
scenario_details.description: Can I navigate through the complete model discovery and installation process?
test_steps: Does model discovery interface open correctly?
Can I search for specific models (Ollama/LM Studio)?
Are model details and capabilities displayed clearly?
Can I initiate model download with progress tracking?
Does installation verification and testing work?
acceptance_criteria: Model discovery flow is intuitive and fast
All available models are clearly categorized
Installed models appear in library immediately
Error handling provides clear user feedback
recommendations: Test complete model discovery and installation flow
Validate search functionality with real model databases
Ensure download progress tracking is accurate

scenario_details.name: Ollama Service Integration and Management
scenario_details.description: Can I effectively connect to and manage Ollama models?
test_steps: Can I see Ollama service status clearly?
Are available Ollama models displayed correctly?
Can I pull new models from Ollama registry?
Does model switching and management work smoothly?
Can I monitor Ollama performance metrics?
acceptance_criteria: Model pulling shows progress and status
Model switching is instant and reliable
Performance metrics are accurate and real-time
critical_paths: Ollama → Connect → List Models → Pull → Use
recommendations: Test Ollama service detection with real instances
Validate model pulling and management workflows

scenario_details.name: LM Studio Integration and Chat Interface
scenario_details.description: Can I seamlessly integrate with LM Studio for local model chat?
test_steps: Navigate to LM Studio integration section
Can I detect running LM Studio instances?
Are loaded models in LM Studio visible?
Can I initiate chat sessions through LM Studio?
Can I configure model parameters effectively?
acceptance_criteria: LM Studio detection is automatic and accurate
Loaded model status is displayed clearly
Chat responses are fast and accurate
critical_paths: LM Studio → Detect → Load Model → Chat → Configure
LM Studio → Models → Select → Parameters → Chat

scenario_details.name: Real-time Performance Monitoring Dashboard
scenario_details.description: Can I monitor and analyze local model performance effectively?
test_steps: Can I view inference speed and latency data?
Does memory usage monitoring work correctly?
acceptance_criteria: Metrics update in real-time without lag
Charts and graphs are readable and informative
Performance data is accurate and meaningful
Historical data is accessible and useful

scenario_details.name: Model Capability Analysis and Benchmarking
scenario_details.description: Can I analyze and benchmark model capabilities effectively?
test_steps: Can I run capability assessments on models?
Can I compare models across different tasks?
acceptance_criteria: Capability assessment is comprehensive and fast
Benchmark results are detailed and accurate
Data export works in multiple formats

scenario_details.name: Advanced Model Configuration Interface
scenario_details.description: Are all model configuration tools functional and intuitive?
acceptance_criteria: All configuration options are clearly labeled

scenario_details.name: Model Version and Update Management
scenario_details.description: Can I effectively manage model versions and updates?
test_steps: Can I view version history for models?
Are update notifications clear and actionable?
Can I rollback to previous versions?
acceptance_criteria: Version history is complete and detailed
Update notifications are timely and accurate
Update detection is automatic and reliable
Rollback process is safe and complete

recommendations: Conduct comprehensive testing with real local models
Test Ollama and LM Studio integration thoroughly
Validate model discovery and installation workflows
Ensure performance monitoring provides accurate metrics
Test model configuration and management features
Ensure local model cache management works efficiently
next_steps: Verify Xcode build success with local model management integration
Test complete local model navigation flow manually
Validate Ollama and LM Studio integration with real instances
Test model discovery, download, and installation workflows
Deploy to TestFlight for human verification
Gather user feedback on local model management usability
Move to Phase 4.2: Hardware Optimization Engine
